title: Where have all the good ADC's gone?
body:
Like really, I just want to support an ADC that knows how to play. when to push, when to back, when to base, when to do anything. It is so hard to find anyone that can work in collaboration with a support, I think small things such as letting the wave push towards ur turret and staying there when ur supp bases to gain that solo lane exp advantage and be safe makes things more easier. Or even backing off when the sup goes to ward, that's a rare thing to see and the amount of adc that die when this happens is huge! 
Also any OCE live streamers??? I've only stumbled across 1 DeFinch, she is cool very interactive with her views, but apart fom that where are all the Pro OCE streamers? anyone plz tell me, or ill watch the NA streams.... I will !!!!!

replies.body:
How do you not know about the Number 10,865 OCE Streamer?

http://www.twitch.tv/nijiiyo
let me know when the stream is on or the youtube chnl!

How do you not know about the Number One OCE Streamer?

http://www.twitch.tv/loserfruit
You don't care because she refuses to acknowledge the existence of Quinn {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Or maybe I just don't know any streamers because I prefer to play a game than watch someone else play.

Honestly, I couldn't care less that they don't acknowledge the existence of Quinn. Most people don't and I still interact with them.
Who's Quinn? The guy on Guardians of the Galaxy , right? =D
who is it? where do they stream?

Loserfruit OCE IGN is YOU IN 40 YEARS

She's an ADC main in Diamond. She Streams on Twitch under the name Loserfruit. Check in monday night she should be up then.
Is me in 40 years? I feel weary now, none the less ill check it out.

I've been playing runescape. Srry teams for the missing good adcs ):


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
thou shall not be forgiven! The pain it has caused me!

> It is so hard to find anyone that can work in collaboration with a support

It's hard to find anyone with the smallest shred of "team play" in them, especially in low elo, and you want something as specific as an ADC who can work with their support? I think we may be playing two different games...

reasons I stopped rank! I had 6 wins  2 losses for pre season rank after the way the losses came about I didn't even bother playing the other 2 games. Considering a lot of s2 pro players are quitting as now LoL is a lot more about team play then anything else, too in depth on their own role when now u really need a team that functions as a single unit. Just the way the game is evolving, shame too many hot heads that have an ego in the way.
